1 <?php
2 
3 namespace Ubiquity\contents\validation;
4 
5 use Ubiquity\orm\parser\Reflexion;
6 use Ubiquity\utils\base\UArray;
7 use Ubiquity\annotations\ValidatorAnnotation;
8 
13 class ValidationModelParser {
14 
15  protected $validators=[];
16 
17  public function parse($modelClass) {
18  $instance=new $modelClass();
19  $properties=Reflexion::getProperties($instance);
20  foreach ( $properties as $property ) {
21  $propName=$property->getName();
22  $annots=Reflexion::getAnnotationsMember($modelClass, $propName, "@validator");
23  if(sizeof($annots)>0){
24  $this->validators[$propName]=[];
25  foreach ($annots as $annotation){
26  if($annotation instanceof ValidatorAnnotation){
27  $this->validators[$propName][]=$annotation->getPropertiesAndValues();
28  }
29  }
30  }
31  }
32 
33  }
34 
35  public function getValidators(){
36  return $this->validators;
37  }
38 
39  public function __toString() {
40  return "return " . UArray::asPhpArray($this->validators, "array") . ";";
41  }
42 }
